mapper.select: select jm.g_no gno, g.name gname, jm.memb_no mno, gm.name mname, jm.g_memb_grd_no mgno, mg.name mgname from gms_join_memb jm inner join gms_memb_grade mg on jm.g_memb_grd_no = mg.g_memb_grd_no inner join gms_group g on jm.g_no = g.g_no inner join gms_memb gm on jm.memb_no = gm.memb_no order by g.g_no asc, jm.g_memb_grd_no asc

select jm.g_no gno, g.name gname, jm.memb_no mno, gm.name mname, jm.g_memb_grd_no mgno, mg.name mgname from gms_join_memb jm inner join gms_memb_grade mg on jm.g_memb_grd_no = mg.g_memb_grd_no inner join gms_group g on jm.g_no = g.g_no inner join gms_memb gm on jm.memb_no = gm.memb_no where mg.g_memb_grd_no=#{memberGrade.gradeNo}

select jm.g_no gno, g.name gname, jm.memb_no mno, gm.name mname, jm.g_memb_grd_no mgno, mg.name mgname from gms_join_memb jm inner join gms_memb_grade mg on jm.g_memb_grd_no = mg.g_memb_grd_no inner join gms_group g on jm.g_no = g.g_no inner join gms_memb gm on jm.memb_no = gm.memb_no where jm.memb_no = #{member.no}
